${ModID}:BalatroQuest.TITLE: Gold Stake
${ModID}:BalatroQuest.DESCRIPTION: Card rewards have a chance to be #yEternal, #yPerishable, or #yRental. #b50% of combats will be enhanced by boss blind effects. Defeat #b8 of these combats to complete the quest.
${ModID}:BalatroQuest.AUTHOR: indi + keurodz
${ModID}:BalatroQuest.REWARD: Apply a random #yEdition to 3 selected cards. Card rewards have a small chance to contain cards with #yEditions.
